result.description: When the formation of the association is coming to a conclusion, a final version of the mission statement is to be released, detailing a) how the association will continue after the end of the project and b) how the association intends to be self-sustaining. In order to substantiate point b), 3 to 5 business scenarios will be analyzed with a concrete implementation plan using the benchmarking platform.

result.title: Data modelling and management
result.description: This deliverable will define specifications for data acquisition, management (DB schemas) and access within the OPTi framework. A requirement analysis will be performed to design application programming interfaces (APIs) needed for trials, as well as for data sharing amongst the modules. As the results of this task would form a technical foundation of the collaboration within the OPTi project, it will be published as a technical report for rest of the partners.
